title: Love Scenery
overview: Adapted from the novel "Ming Qiang Yi Duo, An Jian Nan Fang" (明枪易躲, 暗恋难防) by Qiao Yao (翘摇).An idol singer who shines brightly on the stage turns out to have the gaming skills of an elementary school student. Meanwhile, a smart and handsome university student immerses in the game, not knowing that his beloved idol is on the other side of the screen. Through interlaced time and space, an online crush turns into a budding love. What will happen between the talented female singer and the top male student?
